articles.title: European Super League: UEFA appeals after suspending legal action against Barcelona, Real Madrid and Juventus - Sky Sports
articles.description: UEFA has appealed to remove a judge in Madrid from its case against clubs still committed to the European Super League after suspending its legal action.

articles.description: Trade Minister Damien O'Connor is headed to Washington DC and Europe this week in a hastily announced trip, in hope of pushing forward free trade agreements.
